'''Elder Gwaffah''' was an [[The Eremites|Eremite]] and a member of the [[Tanit]] tribe. 

==Profile==
According to [[Jeht]], Gwaffah and [[Babel]] were "eyesores" to one another, though the exact reasons for their discord are never specified. Babel ordered Jeht to kill him, which she did with the jawbone of a [[Sumpter Beast]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}</ref> Gwaffah's name appears struck out on the [[Crumpled Namelist]] in Jeht's tent in the [[Tanit Camps]].
